Name: Hilly Terrain
Tile Effect: 1 height tier block with abrupt edges.

Name: Slippery Terrain
Tile Effect: Double forced movement, Agility attack or be knocked prone when triggered.

Name: Perilous Terrain
Tile Effect: Difficult terrain and 1d4 damage when triggered

Name: Hazardous Terrain
Tile Effect: Difficult terrain and 1 stack of ailment when triggered.

Name: Restful Terrain
Tile Effect: Advantage on Recover skill checks. Advantage on all Treat skill checks affecting you.

Name: Windy Terrain
Tile Effect: When triggered, Prowess attack or be pushed one tile in the specified direction. At the start of your turn, can change direction of all tiles at once.

Name: Punctuated Terrain
Tile Effect: 3 height tier blocks. Cannot place adjacent to each other.
